name: Melik_Galerha
content:
Melik Galerha was a Force-sensitive human male who served as a Jedi Knight of the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In the year 19 BBY, Galerha attended a briefing on the Republic's Outer Rim Sieges given by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi in one of the conference rooms of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant.
After the briefing, Galerha left the room while conversing with Jedi Master J'oopi Sh√©, passing Kenobi's former Padawan, Anakin Skywalker, as he entered the briefing room. Galerha had dark skin, brown eyes, and black hair. He wore brown Jedi robes and brown boots while on Coruscant and carried a lightsaber.
Melik Galerha first appeared in the 2005 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. The briefing room scene was filmed at Fox Studios, Sydney on August 8, 2003. In the current Star Wars canon, he was identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia. The name originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first used in the 2008 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
